## Sweet Squash 

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| 2 servings  | 45 min | N/A | 


### Ingredients:

- 1 delicata squash 
- 2-3 TBSP vegan butter or coconut oil 
- 3-4 TBSP maple syrup 
- salt

### Directions 

- set oven at 375 
- cut delicata squsah, cut in half and then into ~&frac12; inch slices 
- melt butter/oil and mix with maple syrup 
- coat each piece of squash in mixture of butter/oil and maple syrup 
- put pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
- sprinkle salt on top 
- bake for 20 minutes 
- take out and fip pieces 
- make for another 12-20 minutes
